Academic Honors

AWARDS & GRANTS

  • 2013: Joseph-Armand Bombardier Canada Graduate Scholarship, SSHRC Doctoral Fellowship, $35,000 for 3 years ($105,000 total)
  • 2013: OISE Academic Excellence Award, $2000
  • 2013: OECTA Reverend J.H. Conway Memorial Scholarship for Post-Graduate Studies $2500
  • 2013: The University of Toronto Student Engagement in the Arts Award
  • 2013: Exhibition Assistance Grant, Ontario Arts Council, $500
  • 2012: Exhibition Assistance Grant, Ontario Arts Council, $1000
  • 2011: Exhibition Assistance Grant, Ontario Arts Council, $500
  • 2009: Exhibition Assistance Grant, Ontario Arts Council, $500
  • 2004: J.A. de Sève Graduate Fellowship, Concordia University, $5000
  • 2003: Continuing Scholarship, York University, $200
  • 2000: Continuing Scholarship, York University, $250
  • 1999: Circle of Scholars, York University.
  • 1999: Entrance Scholarship, York University, $4000
